name: Kiwiskunk
description: In the late 1980s, the Skunk invasion landed on New Zealand’s shores. Kiwiskunk was introduced when a New Zealand Skunk variety met NYC Diesel, adding a little something extra to its flavor profile. This 75/25 indica-dominant strain gives off a very potent skunky smell with sweet and citrus flavor. You’ll likely be left with a happy but couch-locked feeling best enjoyed while curling up to a comedy movie.
attributes_title: Happy, Hungry, Sleepy, Creative, Aroused, Depression, Insomnia, Stress, Headache, Dry Eyes
